name: Don't Be Rude
description:
This game made on JavaScript/Html/Css is a Textual Survival Game. The goal of this game is to survive many day as possible. But every day is made of random events that can help or kill our and your groups. You have 4 ressources to manage : Food, Water, Wood for fire and your Population. If one of this egal zero you lose. You add to paid attention at every choise.
Thanks to the techo we use, our Game is playable on every OS. And user frendly, you only need to know how to read to play it.
